profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in high-performance software design and architecture, particularly within cloud-native environments, focusing on **AWS**, **Google Cloud**, and **Microsoft Azure**. My expertise in **C++**, data structures, algorithms, and query execution, combined with a deep understanding of database internals and distributed systems, enables me to develop scalable solutions that enhance performance and maintain code quality. 
Leveraging my experience in production-level code and mentoring, I foster collaboration within teams to ensure adherence to best practices in software development. My background in microservices architecture and performance engineering complements my ability to implement robust systems, including effective use of **Change Streams** and **Atlas** for managing data flows.
Additionally, I have a solid foundation in CI/CD automation and a proven record of leading cross-functional teams in developing enterprise-grade applications that comply with industry standards. I am adept at integrating emerging technologies to drive intelligent automation and predictive analytics in applications.
